Package ohos.bundleactive

Class BundleActiveStates.State

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.bundleactive.BundleActiveStates.State
  • Enclosing class:
    BundleActiveStates

    public static final class BundleActiveStates.State
extends Object
    Provides methods for querying attributes of bundle state data.
    Since:
    4
    See Also:
    BundleActiveStates.queryNextState(BundleActiveStates.State)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int STATE_TYPE_ABILITY_ENDED
      Indicates the state that the ability is invisible on the UI.
      static int STATE_TYPE_ABILITY_PAUSED
      Indicates the state that the ability enters the background.
      static int STATE_TYPE_ABILITY_RESUMED
      Indicates the state that the ability enters the foreground.
      static int STATE_TYPE_CALL_LINK
      Indicates the state that the user has performed a shortcut-related operation.
      static int STATE_TYPE_FOREGROUND_ABILITY_BEGIN
      Indicates the state that the foreground ability is started.
      static int STATE_TYPE_FOREGROUND_ABILITY_END
      Indicates the state that the foreground ability is stopped.
      static int STATE_TYPE_HAS_INTERACTED
      Indicates the state that the user has interacted with the application.
      static int STATE_TYPE_PROFILE_MODIFIED
      Indicates the state that the device configuration has changed.
      static int STATE_TYPE_UNKNOW
      Indicates an unknown state type.
      static int STATE_TYPE_USAGE_PRIORITY_GROUP_MODIFIED
      Indicates the state that the usage priority group of the application has changed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      State​()
      Default constructor used to create an empty State instance.

      Queries the usage priority group of the application to which this BundleActiveStates.State object belongs.

      Queries the bundle name associated with this state.

      Queries the shortcut ID associated with this state.
      String queryNameOfClass​()
      Queries the class name associated with this state.

    • Field Detail

      • STATE_TYPE_ABILITY_ENDED

        public static final int STATE_TYPE_ABILITY_ENDED
        Indicates the state that the ability is invisible on the UI.
        Since:
        4

      • STATE_TYPE_ABILITY_PAUSED

        public static final int STATE_TYPE_ABILITY_PAUSED
        Indicates the state that the ability enters the background.

        You can obtain the bundle name and class name associated with this type of states via queryBundleName() and queryNameOfClass(), respectively.

        Since:
        4

      • STATE_TYPE_ABILITY_RESUMED

        public static final int STATE_TYPE_ABILITY_RESUMED
        Indicates the state that the ability enters the foreground.

        You can obtain the bundle name and class name associated with this type of states via queryBundleName() and queryNameOfClass(), respectively.

        Since:
        4

      • STATE_TYPE_CALL_LINK

        public static final int STATE_TYPE_CALL_LINK
        Indicates the state that the user has performed a shortcut-related operation.
        Since:
        4

      • STATE_TYPE_FOREGROUND_ABILITY_BEGIN

        public static final int STATE_TYPE_FOREGROUND_ABILITY_BEGIN
        Indicates the state that the foreground ability is started.

        You can obtain the bundle name and class name associated with this type of states via queryBundleName() and queryNameOfClass(), respectively.

        Since:
        4

      • STATE_TYPE_FOREGROUND_ABILITY_END

        public static final int STATE_TYPE_FOREGROUND_ABILITY_END
        Indicates the state that the foreground ability is stopped.

        You can obtain the bundle name and class name associated with this type of states via queryBundleName() and queryNameOfClass(), respectively.

        Since:
        4

      • STATE_TYPE_HAS_INTERACTED

        public static final int STATE_TYPE_HAS_INTERACTED
        Indicates the state that the user has interacted with the application.
        Since:

      • STATE_TYPE_PROFILE_MODIFIED

        public static final int STATE_TYPE_PROFILE_MODIFIED
        Indicates the state that the device configuration has changed.
        Since:
        4

      • STATE_TYPE_UNKNOW

        public static final int STATE_TYPE_UNKNOW
        Indicates an unknown state type.

        This state type is not supported currently.

        Since:
        4

      • STATE_TYPE_USAGE_PRIORITY_GROUP_MODIFIED

        public static final int STATE_TYPE_USAGE_PRIORITY_GROUP_MODIFIED
        Indicates the state that the usage priority group of the application has changed.

        You can obtain the new usage priority group via queryAppUsagePriorityGroup().

        Since:
        4

    • Constructor Detail

      • State

        public State​()
        Default constructor used to create an empty State instance.
        Since:
        4

    • Method Detail

      • queryAppUsagePriorityGroup

        public int queryAppUsagePriorityGroup​()
        Queries the usage priority group of the application to which this BundleActiveStates.State object belongs.
        Returns:
        Returns the usage priority group of the application if the state type is STATE_TYPE_USAGE_PRIORITY_GROUP_MODIFIED; returns 0 otherwise.
        Since:
        4
        See Also:
        BundleActiveInfosMgr.USAGE_PRIORITY_GROUP_PRIVILEGE, BundleActiveInfosMgr.USAGE_PRIORITY_GROUP_ALIVE, BundleActiveInfosMgr.USAGE_PRIORITY_GROUP_PREFERENCE, BundleActiveInfosMgr.USAGE_PRIORITY_GROUP_OFTEN, BundleActiveInfosMgr.USAGE_PRIORITY_GROUP_SELDOM, BundleActiveInfosMgr.USAGE_PRIORITY_GROUP_NEVER

      • queryNameOfClass

        public String queryNameOfClass​()
        Queries the class name associated with this state.
        Returns:
        Returns the class name.
        Since:
        4

      • queryStateType

        public int queryStateType​()
        Queries the state type of this state.
        Returns:
        Returns the state type.
        Since:
        4
        See Also:
        STATE_TYPE_ABILITY_PAUSED, STATE_TYPE_ABILITY_RESUMED, STATE_TYPE_PROFILE_MODIFIED, STATE_TYPE_HAS_INTERACTED, STATE_TYPE_USAGE_PRIORITY_GROUP_MODIFIED, STATE_TYPE_FOREGROUND_ABILITY_BEGIN, STATE_TYPE_FOREGROUND_ABILITY_END, STATE_TYPE_ABILITY_ENDED, STATE_TYPE_CALL_LINK, STATE_TYPE_UNKNOW

      • queryBundleName

        public String queryBundleName​()
        Queries the bundle name associated with this state.
        Returns:
        Returns the bundle name.
        Since:
        4

      • queryIndexOfLink

        public String queryIndexOfLink​()
        Queries the shortcut ID associated with this state.
        Returns:
        Returns the shortcut ID if the state type is STATE_TYPE_CALL_LINK; returns null otherwise.
        Since:
        4

      • queryStateOccurredMs

        public long queryStateOccurredMs​()
        Queries the time when this state occurred. The time is the number of milliseconds calculated since 00:00:00 UTC on January 1, 1970 (epoch time).
        Returns:
        Returns the time when this state occurred, in milliseconds.
        Since:
        4
